ygData.subject: Bonds of Force Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: ... kite ... blue ... unlike ... anyone else ... I haven t seen the resist problem yet (but it wouldn t surprise me--snaring and rooting spells seem to have
ygData.messageBody:
> Subject: Bonds of Force Spell
>
> Hi all,
>
> Just turned 29 and was so looking forward to using Bonds of Force spell to
"kite"
> mobs (well, blast and run anyway), but I am getting a lot of resists with
blue
> griffenes,and when it is not resisted it only seems to hold few seconds,
unlike
> druids or rangers low level snare spell which lasts a long time. Can
anyone else
> with more experience with this spell give any advice? Thanks.

I haven't seen the resist problem yet (but it wouldn't surprise me--snaring
and rooting spells seem to have been pretty much nerfed). However,
regarding the short holding time, I've never timed it but Bonds of Force
always has a very short duration (like 10 seconds). Enough time for you to
cast once, and cast Bonds again safely. Be very careful with the spell,
especially while (say) hill giant hunting.

-Brian
